mapper.select: select c.* from contents as c join follow as f on (c.user_id = f.follow_id) where f.follower_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into scraps (content_id, user_id, timestamp) values (#{content_id}, #{user_id}, now())
mapper.delete: delete from scraps where content_id = #{content_id} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from contents where content_id in (select content_id from scraps where user_id = #{user_id})
